member.returns: true if the image request has been successfully processed for the specified page; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Reloads data from the underlying data source and repaints the diagram area.

summary.para: Registers the custom summary function with the specified settings.

member.param: A value containing the function's name.
A value containing the function's display name, which is used for localization purposes.
A enumeration value representing the type of the function's result.
An integer value representing the dimension of the resulting series point's values.
An array of objects containing argument descriptions.
A delegate to be registered.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.RenderFormat

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying the image format used to display a chart.

member.value: The value specifying the image format used to display a chart.

summary.para: Cancels the changes applied to the for each series and makes it equal to the .
Resets the text pattern applied to the legend items via the property.
Resets the collection of the chart's summary functions.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.RightToLeft

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying whether or not the current control supports right-to-left representation.

member.value: One of the enumeration values.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.RuntimeSelection

summary.para: Gets or sets a value indicating if chart elements can be selected by end-users at runtime.

member.value: true if the selection is enabled; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.SaveStateOnCallbacks

summary.para: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a chart's view state should be saved between multiple callbacks.

member.value: true to state a chart's view state between callbacks; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.SaveToFile(System.String)

summary.para: Saves the chart's layout to the specified file.

member.param: A value, which specifies the path to the file where the layout should be stored. If an empty string is specified, an exception is raised.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.SaveToStream(System.IO.Stream)

summary.para: Saves the chart's layout to the specified stream.

member.param: A descendant to which the chart's layout is written.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.SaveToXml

summary.para: Returns the string representing the chart layout in XML format.

member.returns: A value, representing the chart layout in XML format.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.SelectedItems

summary.para: Gets the collection of selected items (chart points and series) and business data objects (in the case of data binding) of the object.

member.value: A list which contains selected chart points, series and business data objects (in the case of data binding).

summary.para: Occurs after the selection of a chart item has been changed.
Occurs before the Chart Control's selected items collection is changed, enabling a handler to cancel the selection change.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.SelectionMode

summary.para: Gets or sets a value which specifies how the chart elements are selected.

member.value: An enumeration member specifying the chart selection behavior.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.Series

summary.para: Provides access to the chart control's collection of series objects.

member.value: A object that represents the collection of all series.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.SeriesDataMember

summary.para: Gets or sets the name of the data field that contains names for automatically generated series.

member.value: A value that specifies the data field's name.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.SeriesNameTemplate

summary.para: Gets the settings used to name data bound series.

member.value: A object that contains naming settings.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.SeriesSelectionMode

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying how the series is selected in the webchart control.

member.value: A enumeration member specifying the selection behavior of a series.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.SeriesSerializable

summary.para: Gets the value used to support serialization of the property.

member.value: A List<Series> object.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.SeriesSorting

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies how series are sorted within the chart control based upon the series names.

member.value: A enumeration value.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.SeriesTemplate

summary.para: Returns the series template that configures automatically generated series.

member.value: The series template that configures automatically generated series.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.SetObjectSelection(System.Object)

summary.para: Selects the specified chart element at runtime.

member.param: A which specifies the chart element to select.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.SettingsLoadingPanel

summary.para: Provides access to the loading panel settings.

member.value: A object containing the loading panel's settings.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.ShowLoadingPanel

summary.para: Gets or sets whether the loading panel should be displayed within the chart while waiting for a callback response.

member.value: true if a loading panel is allowed to be displayed within the ; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.ShowLoadingPanelImage

summary.para: Specifies whether or not the image can be displayed within a loading panel while waiting for a callback response.

member.value: true if an image is allowed to be displayed within the loading panel; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.SideBySideBarDistanceFixed

summary.para: Gets or sets the fixed distance value between bars in all side-by-side series views (2D Side-by-Side Bar, Side-by-Side Range Bar, Side-by-Side Gantt and 3D Side-by-Side Bar) of this chart.

member.value: An integer value which represents the fixed distance between bars, measured in pixels.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.SideBySideBarDistanceVariable

summary.para: Gets or sets the variable distance value between bars in all side-by-side series views (2D Side-by-Side Bar, Side-by-Side Range Bar, Side-by-Side Gantt and 3D Side-by-Side Bar) of this chart.

member.value: A value which represents the variable bar distance between bars, measured in fractions of axis units.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.SideBySideEqualBarWidth

summary.para: Gets or sets a value indicating whether all bars of a series should have equal width in all side-by-side series views (2D Side-by-Side Bar, Side-by-Side Range Bar, Side-by-Side Gantt and 3D Side-by-Side Bar) of this chart.

member.value: true if all bars of the same series should always have equal width; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.SmallChartText

summary.para: Gets the settings for the text to be displayed in the , when it's too small to fit the diagram.

member.value: A object, representing the small chart text options.

summary.para: Occurs when the control size does not allow displaying a readable chart.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.Titles

summary.para: Gets the collection of chart titles.

member.value: A object that represents the collection of chart titles.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.ToolTipController

summary.para: Specifies the tooltip controller component that controls the appearance, position and other settings of tooltips displayed for the Chart control.

member.value: A object.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.ToolTipEnabled

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether or not a tooltip is enabled for a chart.

member.value: Default - a tooltip's state (enabled/disabled) is automatically determined according to the type of a diagram currently displayed on a chart; True - a tooltip is enabled for a chart; False - a tooltip is disabled.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.ToolTipOptions

summary.para: Gets the tooltip settings allowing you to specify the tooltip's position and appearance on a diagram.

member.value: A object descendant which represents tooltip options.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.UnregisterSummaryFunction(System.String)

summary.para: Unregisters the summary function with the specified name.

member.param: A value representing the name of the summary function to be unregistered.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.Web.WebChartControl.Width

summary.para: Gets or sets the width of the chart.

member.value: A value which represents the control's width.
